passive.name: Teary-Eyed
passive.description: At the start of the battle, the DMG dealt to all allies decreases by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> for {{3}} turn(s). At the same time, immediately restores HP to all allies equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of the respective HP difference between the characters' Max HP and current HP.
